entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Blind River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:48 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and local blowing snow ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of snow. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain or snow. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
